originalText.text: Awesome people to work with. John, Manan, and Kaisen have been a great help in helping us with Facebook ads. They send over 10K of texts for us every week and their engagement team is the best. Highly recommended.

text.text: Awesome people to work with. John, Manan, and Kaisen have been a great help in helping us with Facebook ads. They send over 10K of texts for us every week and their engagement team is the best. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: "They have all fake reviews. Do NOT trust this company. I agree with Adam. For one month, try this company. If it works and we are happy with them, continue getting service for $2395.00 for months. Before 30 days, I talked to Adam and requested to cancel the service. They accepted and canceled my service, but they charged me for the second month. I talked to Adam several times; he told me they would refund for the second month but never did. I DID NOT SELL ANY CAR UNDER THIS ADVERTISING COMPANY."

originalText.text: Excellent application. My BDC can now reach hundreds of leads in a few hours without wasting time on the phone. Great customer service and training.

text.text: Excellent application. My BDC can now reach hundreds of leads in a few hours without wasting time on the phone. Great customer service and training.

originalText.text: I have been using simpsocial now for a year now and I DO NOT REGRET IT! Our company thrives off making appointments through simpsocial. I have watched our sales rise because of the leads and response rate. Manan Dhawan is the BEST and helps me through it all. There has never been a time he hasn't answered all my questions and calls he is absolutely helpful through it all. His team has taught me a lot and trained my BDC very well. Thank you for all your hard work and dedication guys and whoever is looking to make this one of their platforms I recommend and give 10 stars!
